p: The distillation apparatus Gerhardt (Königswinter, Germany) was used for the extraction of essential oils from the basil plant material. Distilled water used in the experiments was prepared by an Aqua Osmotic type 02 (Aqua Osmotic, Tišnov, Czech Republic) water purification system. The distilled water meets the standards according to ČSN 68 4063, Czech Pharmacopoeia 2005, and ČSN ISO 3696.
